page.title: 17CLASHNESSIE
page.content: This small{hamlet}lies to the south of our block on the exposed coastline overlooking the{Minch.}It has a clean open sandy beach which is slowly{eroding}up past the road. There are a few holiday homes and a small{camping site}on the beach. It is also known to be very good for {surfing.}The burn(stream) running through the beach is good for paddling in, you can also catch small trout in it. Clashnessie also has a small {waterfall}which is approximately half a kilometer from the road. At the top of the waterfall is {Loch an {Easain.}At the bottom of the falls is the burn which runs down to the sea through the beach. One summer the falls were so dried up you could see all the{eels and {small trout}falling down the side.
